name: Ryan Barlow
about: Mechanical Engineering student at the University of Kentucky College of Engineering. Experienced in customer service and hospitality, with a passion for leadership and community engagement through Christian campus ministry.

experience.title: Suite Attendant
experience.description: Welcomed and assisted guests, ensured a positive experience, and built relationships with recurring attendees.

experience.title: Retail Stock Associate
experience.description: Educated customers on spa and pool products, assembled/disassembled furniture, and handled various store tasks including cashiering.

volunteering.title: Volunteer Leader
volunteering.description: Led Christian campus ministry events, prepared and facilitated Bible studies, and participated in community engagement activities.
